channel.title: Combining Sources.. Help
channel.description: I know I've been posting a lot recently, but these are things I simply can not find online or in search. I want to use the Acheon src and client, but when I was using TrisidiaXV3, I really liked the control panel. And in acheon, I really enjoy the Staff Potato (opens a menu). I want to be able to use the TrisidiaX Cpanel in acheon. I tried combining sources altogether, but the end result of that is <TrisidiaXV3 cPanel + Src, and Acheon Client (the Staff Potato wasn't working). I was thinking about it before I went to sleep last night, and I think it has something to do with the scripts files. So how should I go about this combining the two?

item.title: Combining Sources.. Help
item.dc:creator: @wimbow wimbow
item.description:
@wimbow wrote:

I know I’ve been posting a lot recently, but these are things I simply can not find online or in search. I want to use the Acheon src and client, but when I was using TrisidiaXV3, I really liked the control panel. And in acheon, I really enjoy the Staff Potato (opens a menu). I want to be able to use the TrisidiaX Cpanel in acheon. I tried combining sources altogether, but the end result of that is <TrisidiaXV3 cPanel + Src, and Acheon Client (the Staff Potato wasn’t working). I was thinking about it before I went to sleep last night, and I think it has something to do with the scripts files. So how should I go about this combining the two?
